songs.title: One Bad Night
songs.lyrics:
[Chorus]
Talk with your fingertips
Don't stop the car, let's drive
Suck on your amber lips
Just give me one bad night
Heart beat is razor thin
Hot heat, you make me high
Get underneath my skin
Just give me one bad night

[Pre-Chorus]
Ooh, ahh
You make me feel like
I wanna be bad
I wanna be bad, bad
Ooh, ahh
Let's have a good time
And never look back
Let's never look back

[Chorus]
Talk with your fingertips
Don't stop the car, let's drive
Suck on your amber lips
Just give me one bad night
(One bad night)
Heart beat is razor thin
(One bad night)
Hot heat, you make me high
(One bad night)
Get underneath my skin
(Give me one bad night)
Just give me one bad night

[Breakdown]
One bad night
One bad night
One bad night
One bad night

[Verse 2]
We play with fire
These yellow marks get glowing, ember on the wire
I'm burning with you on this black tar road
When it feels this good, you don't let go

[Pre-Chorus]
Ooh, ahh
You make me feel like
I wanna be bad
I wanna be bad

[Chorus]
Talk with your fingertips
Don't stop the car, let's drive
Suck on your amber lips
Just give me one bad night
(One bad night)
Heart beat is razor thin
(One bad night)
Hot heat, you make me high
(One bad night)
Get underneath my skin
(Give me one bad night)
Just give me one bad night

[Outro]
One bad night
One bad night
One bad night
One bad night

[Bridge]
All night
Never gonna stay
All night
Never gonna stay
All night

[Breakdown]
One bad night
One bad night
One bad night
One bad night

[Outro]
All night
All night
